sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_table_builder.TBTableExtensionsAPI</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TBTableExtensionsAPI</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TBTableExtensionsAPI = Class.create();
TBTableExtensionsAPI.prototype = {
    initialize: function(table) {
        this.table = table;
    },

    build: function() {
        var res = this._validate();

        if (res.isValid) {
            var result = {
                isExtended: false
            };
            var gr = new GlideTableHierarchy(this.table);
            var isExtended = gr.hasExtensions();
            if (isExtended) {
                var extendingTables = gr.getTableExtensions();
                result.isExtended = true;
                result.tables = extendingTables;
            }
            return result;
        }
        return TBUtil.error(res);
    },

    _validate: function() {
        var res = Validators.isValidTableRecord(this.table);

        if (!res.isValid) {
            res.message = gs.getMessage('No record found');
        }

        return res;
    },

    type: 'TBTableExtensionsAPI'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-11 02:01:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6d535407c721201031a006d427c260f1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TBTableExtensionsAPI</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Table Builder" source="sn_table_builder">f53f19bac362fa22ca2e93692d32f18f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Table Builder">f53f19bac362fa22ca2e93692d32f18f</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6d535407c721201031a006d427c260f1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-01-15 06:24:19</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
